Uses of Package
net.sourceforge.pbeans

Packages that use net.sourceforge.pbeans
net.sourceforge.pbeans Contains class Store, the main point of interaction with persistent storage. 
 

Classes in net.sourceforge.pbeans used by net.sourceforge.pbeans
Index
          Represents a database index.
Persistent
          JavaBeans tagged with this interface can be used with Store.
PersistentMap
          A persistent map of strings to Persistent objects.
Store
          This is the main point of interaction with persistent storage.
StoreException
           
StoreInfo
          For any class Clazz that implements Persistent, you may define Clazz_StoreInfo which implements this interface.
